sentences.english: So on Friday, we'll start with talking about the wave functions for the multi-electron atoms.
sentences.chinese: 在週五，我們要開始討論，多電子原子的波函數。

sentences.english: Its Tochigi and Iwaki plants, north of Tokyo, would remain shut until Friday.
sentences.chinese: 位於東京北部櫪木和磐城的工廠將停產至週五。

sentences.english: I will take an end-of-term exam this Friday.
sentences.chinese: 這週五我要進行期末考試。

sentences.english: This is CS50, Friday of Week 0.
sentences.chinese: 本課程是CS50，第一週週五的課。

sentences.english: One Friday, 12-year-old Janet was going to stay all night with her friend Amy.
sentences.chinese: 一個週五，12歲的珍妮特要陪她的朋友艾米過夜。

sentences.english: The sports meeting to next Friday because of the rain.
sentences.chinese: 由於下雨，這個運功會推遲到下週五。

sentences.english: and then absolutely nothing on Fridays. But on Wednesdays,
sentences.chinese: 然後週五完全沒課。但是在週三，

sentences.english: Every nights a friday night, and I never know what to expect.
sentences.chinese: 每天晚上都是週五之夜，我從來不知道要期待什麼。

sentences.english: It requires everyone to wear formal clothes from Monday to Friday.
sentences.chinese: 規定要求所有人從週一都週五必須穿正裝。

sentences.english: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA 11,063, -31.79, -0.29%)  closed slightly lower on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 道瓊斯工業平均指數週五收盤時小幅走低。

sentences.english: From now on, every Friday afternoon at the Spring Garden.
sentences.chinese: 從現在開始，每週五下午，在春園。

sentences.english: On that Friday I had an eye doctor appointment.
sentences.chinese: 那個週五我和眼科醫生有預約。

sentences.english: Dr. Joh on will be available on Friday afternoon this week.
sentences.chinese: 約翰遜大夫本週週五有空。

sentences.english: We'll keep an eye out for the bug-fixing update on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我們會持續留意本週五的錯誤修正更新排程。

sentences.english: The original will be sent with Lars when he goes to China on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 拉爾斯當他去中國上週五將發送原。

sentences.english: Love is the only industry which can't operate on a five-day week.
sentences.chinese: 愛是唯一不能實行每週五天工作制的產業。

pinyin: Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
